entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 7:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
